activities_info.details:
MedSupplyDrive - National PPE Distribution and Volunteer Network

Our mission is to mobilize volunteers across the country to collect and donate medical supplies to local hospitals in need.

Supplies to Donate

**All must be unused (YES, they CAN be opened)**

Surgical masks

N95 masks

Non-latex gloves (from labs, restaurants, homes, anywhere!)

Medical/Surgical gowns

Plastic rain ponchos (some protection is better than none)

Bleach/bleach wipes

Bandanas (as recommended by the CDC)

Hand sanitizer

Face shields

Tyvek and hazmat suits

If you are interested in joining our initiative, please fill out our interest form on our website for us to send more information and directions your way. Currently 600+ volunteers from across 42 states and DC have already signed up to help out, and we would love to have you join our team.

We are accepting monetary donations which can be made at https://www.medicalsupplydrive.com/donate-now! No donation is too small. All donations go towards buying and transporting personal protective equipment directly into the hands of medical workers on the frontlines.

Our Website: https://www.medicalsupplydrive.com
Our Twitter: https://twitter.com/medsupplydrive
Our Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/medsupplydrive
Our Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/medsupplydrive
